_xResult.title: Green Wool Pantsuit with Peak Lapels
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom Order: Configured Pantsuit with Premium Lining Upgrade
_xResult.longdesc:
You will look gorgeous in this beautiful green custom made women's suit with peak lapels. Wear it from office to party and pair it with different accessories for each occasion. Cut and tailored from Wool fabric specifically with women in mind, this beautiful slim fitting green suit accentuates your figure. The fully lined, flat-front pants with diagonal side pockets and front zipper creates a classic suit for all occasions.

 
 
Fabric details
  • Outer fabric composition (blazer): 80% Wool & 20% Terylene
  • Outer fabric composition (pants): 80% Wool & 20% Terylene
  • Lining fabric composition: 55% Polyester & 45% Viscose
  • Dry clean only

 

Configuration

 

Blazer: Green Robinhood color outer, Cleon premium lining inside; single breasted style, peak lapel, 1 buttons, padded shoulders, back center vent, slanted flap pockets, real breast pocket, brass buttons, open (cutaway) hemline.



Pants: Green Robinhood color outer, same color pants lining; long length, high rise, Flat-front no pleats, fastening: centered button, no pants cuff, diagonal front pockets, two double welted back pockets with button. Standard waist, no belt loops. Fully lined ($15 upcharge).
